attributes.action: Make fractional reserve banking illegal and petition the Bank of England return to the silver stirling standard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that we the public realise how fragile our banking system is, now is time to get to the root cause. There is another way to regulate this industry and solve this financial crises without anymore bailouts, added national debt and limited inflation. All we need is full reserve banking, a return to a silver stirling standard and an end to money creation by the Bank of England.
